thread.section_title: 2Friends Beach Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Entebbe, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A perfect stopover
thread.title_full: A perfect stopover - Review of 2Friends Beach Hotel, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: MissFussyUk
title: A perfect stopover
text:
There is simply nowhere better to stay in Entebbe. Only ten minutes drive from the airport, you can avoid Kampala traffic if scheduled for an early flight for your safari the next day.
A great way to start your holiday with airport transfers (free one way, 10 USD return) and fantastic staff.
There is a lovely little pool to cool off in and a fabulous beach bar across the road. Rooms are spacious and clean and ours had a view of both the pool and lake, which was perfect to catch the late afternoon sun on the balcony while being entertained by vervet monkeys.
Food and drink is good with excellent service.
See all photos
